PF1AS.InfoMissingClass: Your character is missing a class. Go to the features tab and add one.
PF1AS.NoFeatures: Create (+) or drag from a compendium into this list

Chat.addAttackChatCardTemplateN: Add alternative attack roll chat card
Chat.addAttackChatCardTemplateH: Adds another alternative attack roll chat card for selection. You need to manually select it in the system settings.

Spells.CannotCast: You cannot cast spells of this level because:
Spells.CannotCastAbilityScore: - your ability score is not high enough

Config.ResetTooltip: Clears the module-specific config for this actor and restores the default. Good when something seems to be broken.
